grails.plugin.nimble.core
[Groovy] Class Permission

java.lang.Object
  grails.plugin.nimble.core.Permission
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
class Permission

Our permission object encapsulates details that a normal Shiro deployment would put into mapping tables to make life a little easier.

Authors:
Bradley Beddoes
